text:
RAHUL BAJAJ: What
is family management
versus professional management?
What is a professional manager?
Well, he's not an owner.

Then, why do you give
him stock option?

He becomes an owner,
but he's a minor owner.

OK, he's a minor owner, but
why do you give it to him?
For adding incentive.

You recruit him, and retain
him to provide continuity.
That's what the owner does.
He's born with that incentive.

Meaning, he's got
the equity in stock

and he won't leave that company
to get a professional-- not

for 20% maybe, but for
100% increase in salary

or 300% increase in salary
to a much bigger company,
he will leave you.
it happens every day.
The owners, they won't.
The owner won't.

For obvious reasons,
by and large.

You get the incentive,
you get the motivation,
you get continuity.

Because of your ownership,
you have long-term thinking,

you're not concerned
with quarterly results.

You're not impressed, you're
not going to buy shares,
you're not going to sell shares.

Your stock options
don't depend on

that, you don't
have stock options.

I don't have--
none of our Bajajs

in the group have ever
had a stock option.

We have huge shares,
probably 50% or more
in each of our company group.

But-- so I asked what
is a family company,
what is a professional company?

Let's take Bajaj while we
are talking about that,

but this also applies in
all Bajaj Group company.
But let's take Bajaj Auto.

We employ about 9,000
people, top to bottom.
We have a 16 member board.

Below the 16 member
board, there's no Bajaj.

9,000 people there is no Bajaj,
there's no relative of Bajaj,
there's no nothing.

In the board the
family is represented,
but who are full time directors?

The Non-executive director,
neither here nor there.

There are only three
whole time directors.
Chairman, me.

Vice-chairman, my cousin,
not brother, cousin.
Mudhur Bajaj.
And my eldest son.

Not my youngest son, he's in
the financial services company.

And the same story
repeats there.

Even less, with their board
level, only one guy is a Bajaj.
